description: Pat Summerall and John Madden on the call for decades.  They worked together as game announcers for 22 seasons.
metaDescription: Pat Summerall and John Madden on the call for decades.  They worked together as game announcers for 22 seasons.
topicText:
How Long Did John Madden and Pat Summerall Call Games ...
Pat Summerall and John Madden formed one of the most iconic broadcasting duos in NFL history. How long did the two call games together?
How Long Have John Madden and Pat Summerall Worked Together ...
Madden joined CBS as a low-level color commentator after resigning as the Oakland Raiders' head coach in 1979. Things changed in 1981, when CBS promoted MaddenÂ ...
